channel.title: PureOS instead of Debian
channel.description:
Dear developers,
Debian, of course, is a very good OS. But unfortunately, it and its core contain blobs and proprietary firmwares.
Why don't you switch to PureOS instead of Debian to improve the security of Kicksecure? Project PureOS has an exceptionally clean kernel and no proprietary firmwares and drivers (and even an open BIOS).
